   8  .glowingtabs ul{
   9  position:relative;
  10  list-style-type: none;
  11  margin:0;
  12  margin-left:0px; /*Left offset of entire tab menu relative to page*/
  13  padding:.34em 1.5% 8%;
  14  }
  15  
  16  .glowingtabs li{
  17  display:inline;
  18  margin:0;

  28  margin-right: 0px; /*spacing between each tab*/
  29  padding:0 0 0 20px; /* controls the space between the left and right image */
  30  text-decoration:none;
  31  border:none;
  32  }
  33  
  34  .glowingtabs a span{
  35  float:left;
  36  display:block;

  40  }
  41

  44  /* End IE5-Mac hack */
  45  
  46  
  47  .glowingtabs li.current a{
  48      background-position:0% -96px; /*Shift background image up to start of 2nd tab image*/
  49  }
  50  
  51  .glowingtabs li.current a span{
  52      background-position:100% -96px; /*Shift background image up to start of 2nd tab image*/
  53  }
  54  
  55  .tabcontainer{
  56  clear: left;
  57  width:95%; /*width of 2nd level sub menus*/
  58  height:1.5em; /*height of 2nd level sub menus. Set to largest's sub menu's height to avoid jittering.*/
  59  }
  60

  62  display:none;
